name: AXA
bossPosition: Group Head of Public Affairs and Corporate responsibility
goal: AXA Group is a Pan European and global Insurance player headquartered in France. AXA strives for an integrated single market in the Insurance sector.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Solvabilité II, Stabilité Financière, Union des Marchés de Capitaux, Plan Juncker, protection du consommateur, Sante, Longévité, Protection des données, agenda digital, risque climatique, reporting non financier
